description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that gives the user paw pads on their palms, allowing them to repel anything they touch, from physical objects to intangible concepts like pain and memories.

abilities.description: Kuma can repel anything he touches with his paw pads. In this episode, he uses this ability to instantly make Perona vanish by touching her.

strengths: Can repel physical attacks and projectiles
Can repel living beings to distant locations
Can repel intangible concepts like pain, fatigue, and memories
Provides both offensive and defensive capabilities
Extremely versatile with applications limited only by user's creativity
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Sea-Prism Stone)
User typically wears gloves to prevent accidental activation

reveals.information: First demonstration of the Nikyu Nikyu no Mi's repelling powers at Thriller Bark
The fruit can instantly send people to distant locations with a single touch

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to manifest and control shadows, including creating shadow clones and stealing shadows from others.

abilities.description: Moria uses his shadow to deceive Luffy, making him chase the shadow instead of Moria's actual body.

reveals.information: Moria can use his shadow as a decoy to mislead opponents
